Class EntityEvent

java.lang.Object
  |

        +--com.milk.util.BaseEvent

              +--com.milk.uberchat.event.EntityEvent
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public final class EntityEvent
extends BaseEvent

This is the class for events having to do with happenings on a ChatEntity.

Author:
Dan Bornstein, danfuzz@milk.com
, Copyright 1999 Dan Bornstein, all rights reserved.

getEntity

public ChatEntity getEntity()
Get the source of this event as a ChatEntity. It is merely a convenience to avoid having to do the cast yourself.
